reviews.text: Poured from a bottle at Bryggerifestivalen Trondheim 2016. Pale yellow, near clear, coloured body. Tiny white head, fragile lacing. Vague lemony hops on the nose, hints of pale malts. Mixed taste of noble hops and mild grainy malts. Restrained malt-bitter endnotes. Oily palate. Clean. Okay version of the style. (shared with bergstaden, 05.08.2016).
Bottle at Wicked Wine tasting, Sthlm.Cola color. Coffe,, tar, molasses, well placed bitterness. Intense flavour, very pleasant.
How : bottle Appearance : dark brown with a small tanned head. Aroma : dark syrup, pine, rye bread, caramel and plums. Palate : medium body, soft carbonation.
